title: Simplify3D 3.0.2 Slicer for 3DPrinter x64 ONLY
description:
Found it on a forum. Have Fun with it

1. Install the program.
2. Copy SimplifyLoader to the program directory - something like C:Program FilesSimplify 3D 3.0.2
3. Change the destkop shortcut to point to the SimplifyLoader. 
4. Happy printing! :)


I compiled the program with visual studio so you may need to download the Visual C++ redistributable. And yes it is because i'm lazy! :P
If you get a Error try using try downloading "http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784" and/or install All in One Runtimes" http://www.sereby.org/site/downloads-AiO

By the way, sometimes the Loader may be too slow and fail to initiate the program. In that case just execute it again. :)
Tested under windows 10
